ModMetaData.name: No Hopeless Romance
ModMetaData.author: cedaro
ModMetaData.description:
Prevent hopeless yet stupid romance attempt from happening.
Only when all conditions be true will A try having romance attempt to B: - A & B's compatibility greater than 0 - A & B's mutual opinion greater than 50 - A & B are in same faction - A's gender is attractive for B - B's gender is attractive for A - A & B have joined in colony for more than 15 days - A has no "Rebuffed My Romance Attempt" memory - A & B has no spouse - if A has lover, A's opinion of lover less than 25 - if B has lover, B's opinion of lover less than 25
Only when all conditions be true will A try having marriage proposal to B: - A & B's mutual opinion greater than 75 - A & B have joined in colony for more than 30 days
